message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique and valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to you, and I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product, but my budget is more limited. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $850000. I hope this aligns better with what you're willing to accept.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a better deal. However, I'm still willing to negotiate. Considering the value of the product, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm proposing a counteroffer of $875000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I believe it's still a fair price for this incredible product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After considering your latest offer, I would like to counter with $860000. I hope this proposal will be acceptable to you.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to find a sweet spot, but I'm still not willing to go below $875000. Considering the product's value, I'm willing to make a small concession. I'm proposing a counteroffer of $872500. This is the best I can do, and I hope it will be acceptable to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I've reviewed it carefully and would like to counter with $865000. I hope this proposal will be more in line with what you're willing to accept.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not willing to go below $875000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but that's as low as I can go. I'm proposing a counteroffer of $870000. This is my final offer, and I hope you'll consider it.

I appreciate your efforts to accommodate my budget, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to counter with $867500. I hope this proposal will be within your range and allow us to reach an agreement.
